attributes.action: Bring back national service/conscription for the long term unemployed under 30yrs of age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see national service to be brought in for anyone male/female between the ages of 17-30, that has been unemployed for a long period and not enroled in further education/apprentiship. We beleive this would stop the dwindling numbers interested in our armed forces. The range of jobs are vast and range from cost accountant, chefs, drivers the jobs are endless. We believe that the skills and discipline learned during their time would indeed create a better more civilised society

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Bring back national service/conscription for the long term unemployed under 30yrs of age."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15937.asp

Prime Minister's Office
